name: Pom Pom Beanie
description:
The ACME beanie has arrived! This embroidered beauty has a snug fit that ensures you're going to feel cozy and warm whatever you're doing.

• 60% cotton, 40% acrylic
• Breathable cotton blend
• Form-fitting shape
• One size fits most

name: Lightweight Jacket
description:
Add a little zing to your winter wardrobe with this vibrant Winter-breaker Jacket. With a brushed fleece inside, and a relaxed unisex fit, this jacket is just the stuff of the dreams, so be quick to grab yourself one!

Long sleeve ripstop jacket colorblocked in black. Rough pattern in obsidian black and brown printed throughout. Printed graphic in white throughout. Logo-woven webbing trim in white and black throughout. Bungee-style drawstring at hood featuring rubberized logo hardware. Zip closure at front. Rubberized logo appliqué at chest. Welt pockets and textile logo patch in orange at waist. Elasticized cuffs. Partially lined. Black hardware.

name: T-Shirt
description: This t-shirt is a must-have in your wardrobe, combining the timeless fit of a classic tee with an intricate embroidered detail that brings the shirt to a whole new level. It's soft and durable, so be prepared to have a new favorite t-shirt!

name: Mask
description: This durable face mask is made from two layers of treated fabric and features elastic ear loops and a center flat seam that ensure a close fit. It's machine-washable and reusable. Sold in packs of 3.

name: Water Bottle
description:
This is the only reusable bottle that looks great and does good. Our water bottle keeps your drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12, while giving back to those in need. ACME bottles are beautifully crafted and designed to last.

• Triple-layered insulation
• Worry-free hydration

name: Mug
description:
A funny and original gift to make the point of being unique. Affordable price and elegant at the same time. This coffee mug will not crack with extra hot coffee or iced tea. It features a large C handle for comfort.

• Durable coffee mug. Ships protected in its individual box
• Printed with premium ink, it will not fade over the years.
• 100% safe for dishwasher and microwave.
• Makes a very unique gift for every occasion, party or gifts for the office

name: Mouse Pad
description:
Designed for professional-grade performance, the ACME Mouse Pad delivers smooth gliding and top-tier precision for daily office and home use alike.

• Superior quality surface
• Steady & strong rubber base
• Compatible with all mouse types

name: Pillow
description:
Our Pillow is specifically sourced with a High Grade Fiber Filling that wont be found in any other pillow. We have the exclusive rights to this perfect pillow filling. Use in any room of your home or office. As an accessory to your Bed Room, or as a decorative but useful piece in your Living Room.

• Luxury Plush Material
• Fluffy & Support

name: Jacket
description:
The next generation of a ACME classic, this outdoor staple features a finely tuned fit and a soft-yet-rugged filament-fleece fabrication to keep you warm when temperatures plummet.

• 100% polyester micro poplin
• Wind and rain resistant
• Half zip pullover with a hood
• Front kangaroo pocket • Hidden zipped pouch pocket
• Packable in the zipped pouch pocket
• Adjustable bungee draw cord at hood and bottom hem
• Elastic cuffs

name: Laptop Sleeve
description:
This great modern yet elegant professional designed laptop sleeve protects your laptop and accessories from any unwanted bumps, scrapes and knocks, which may result in damage to your device.

• Form-fitting sleeve with quick top-loading access
• Precise fit for laptops and ultrabooks
• Slim design allows you to carry the case by itself or in a bag

name: Unisex Shorts
description:
It looks like you found your next favorite workout sweatpants—the shorts are light and breathable, making them perfect for sports. Or if you feel like lounging on the couch, these soft shorts are just what you need.

• 65% polyester, 35% cotton
• Fabric weight: 250 g/m² (10.5 oz/y²)
• Back patch pocket
• Slim fit (women may want to order a size down)

name: Unisex Joggers
description:
Get ready for that 10K run or take it slow in your backyard—these joggers are sure to make you feel comfortable either way.

• 60% cotton, 40% polyester pre-shrunk fleece
• Fabric weight: 7.2 oz/yd² (244 g/m²)
• 1x1 rib cuffs with spandex for stretch and recovery
• Elastic waistband with external drawcord
• Contrast drawcord and side pockets (all body colors include charcoal gray contrast detailing except black heather, which has black)
• Lower rise on the front, longer rise on the backside
• Pilling-resistant
• Tapered leg
